医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
海尔生物医学提供更好的液氮存储途径海尔生物医学推出了新一代液氮容器，可以轻松便捷地获取储存的样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Haier-Biomedical-offers-improved-access-to-liquid-nitrogen-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Haier-Biomedical-offers-improved-access-to-liquid-nitrogen-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=032f5a84-f7a2-4370-a9f8-550c3c86cf8f Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:59:00 -0400 Haier Biomedical offers improved access to liquid nitrogen storage
Unity 2.0 发布：通过一个平台订购、跟踪和管理您的化合物收藏eMolecules 推出了一个新的更新平台，使药物化学家或化合物经理能够通过更直观和灵活的系统订购、跟踪和管理他们的化合物收集和商业来源：Unity。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Release-of-Unity-20-Order-track-and-manage-your-compound-collection-through-one-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Release-of-Unity-20-Order-track-and-manage-your-compound-collection-through-one-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d541c297-abe4-4c20-8c44-a773558a4dce Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:55:00 -0400 Release of Unity 2.0: Order, track, and manage your compound collection through one platform
大规模研究发现植物与动物超加工食品对心血管疾病风险的影响在本研究中，研究人员根据英国人膳食中植物或动物来源的食物种类以及食品加工类别的摄入量，调查了他们的心血管疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Large-scale-study-presents-findings-on-implications-of-plant-vs-animal-ultra-processed-foods-on-cardioangio-disease-风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Large-scale-study-presents-findings-on-implications-of-plant-vs-animal-ultra-processed-foods-on-cardioangio-disease- risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0694b78-942d-4dc2-97d6-2fdff8c89bb8 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:41:00 -0400 Large-scale study presents findings on implications of plant vs animal ultra-processed foods on cardiovascular disease risk
研究揭示了为什么靶向治疗在一些非小细胞肺癌患者中失败伦敦大学学院、弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和阿斯利康的研究人员发现了非小细胞肺癌的靶向治疗对某些患者（尤其是从未吸烟的患者）不起作用的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-uncovers-why-targeted-therapy-fails-in-some-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-uncovers-why-targeted-therapy-fails-in-some-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7171443-1b99-4ea4-b027-bd164e3a01f8 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:13:00 -0400 Study uncovers why targeted therapy fails in some non-small cell lung cancer patients
Open-ILD：开创性干细胞研究对抗间质性肺疾病想象一个呼吸是一种奢侈的世界，咳嗽标志着内心斗争的声音。间质性肺病 (ILD) 是一种以炎症和纤维化为特征的疾病，是严重呼吸道疾病的主要原因，可能发生在儿童中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Open-ILD-Pioneering-stem-cell-research-to-combat-interstitial-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Open-ILD-Pioneering-stem-cell-research-to-combat-interstitial-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2b1666d-7d84-4caa-9d99-0a66006abb26 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 09:09:00 -0400 Open-ILD: Pioneering stem cell research to combat interstitial lung disease
世界无烟日小组讨论https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/世界无烟日-Panel-Discussion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/世界无烟日-Panel-Discussion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f81efe0-1389-4ad2-9441-f86e26658c0c Thu, 13 Jun 2024 07:47:00 -0400 World No Tobacco Day Panel Discussion
资金不稳定困扰着向服务欠缺地区提供文件的计划对于哈莱姆区家庭健康中心的住院医生戴安娜·佩雷斯来说，她收到的患者手写的感谢信就是她选择正确训练道路所需的全部证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Funding-instability-plagues-program-that-brings-docs-to-underserved-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Funding-instability-plagues-program-that-brings-docs-to-underserved-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29a30c2f-f95b-4799-8256-e58922f5c7d9 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 07:23:05 -0400 Funding instability plagues program that brings docs to underserved areas
拜登的目标是废除平价医疗法案对既有疾病保护意味着什么乔·拜登总统的连任竞选活动希望选民将他的医疗保健政策记录与其前任进行对比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Bidene28099s-on-target-about-what-repealing-ACA-would-mean-for-preexisting-condition-protections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Bidene28099s-on-target-about-what-repealing-ACA-would-mean-for-preexisting-condition-protections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9c918ed-1c3a-4fd4-8c5f-03de92d6332d Thu, 13 Jun 2024 07:21:40 -0400 Biden’s on target about what repealing ACA would mean for preexisting condition protections
观看：加州向吸毒者支付费用以保持清洁KFF 健康新闻高级记者安吉拉·哈特 (Angela Hart) 上周出现在 Spectrum News 1 的《今日洛杉矶时报》上，解释加州如何通过付钱让他们保持清洁来帮助吸毒者戒除毒瘾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Watch-California-pays-drug-users-to-stay-clean.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Watch-California-pays-drug-users-to-stay-clean.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9c42aab-6199-49ab-8823-96d5220961cf Thu, 13 Jun 2024 07:05:55 -0400
从发现生物学到 ELRIG 主席：与 Melanie Leveridge 的对话在本次采访中，我们采访了阿斯利康发现生物学副总裁兼 ELRIG 英国董事会主席 Melanie Leveridge，讨论她在制药行业的广泛职业生涯、她在促进科学创新方面的作用以及她对 ELRIG 未来的愿景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/From-Discovery-Biology-to-ELRIG-Chair-A-Conversation-with-Melanie-Leveridge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/From-Discovery-Biology-to-ELRIG-Chair-A-Conversation-with-Melanie-Leveridge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59c77d01-8f8d-471e-a2a8-a582df101e2a Thu, 13 Jun 2024 06:57:00 -0400 From Discovery Biology to ELRIG Chair: A Conversation with Melanie Leveridge
